values:
phew, definately been awhile. sorry. working two jobs, and trying to have a life just doesn't leave much time for anything whatsoever. well, im not really complaining though, i like having two jobs ($$$), plus now that im kinda dating mike olson, it's all good. 

you know, it's nice to be able to take things slow with a guy, instead of just jumping into a relationship like i always do. 



ugh, i just got home from one job, and now im off to the next. be back by 1 a.m. or so. lol bye
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/61479.html

wow, been awhile. lol. sorry been busy busy busy

hmm, well, i have another job, at best buy in the wireless department, and it's the shit. i love this job. the people are all really cool and nice. plus, the guy i like works there. *sigh* mike olson. he's really nice, tall, older, drives, got a car, and has a job. plus, he doesn't smoke, and i don't think he does drugs or smokes. *yay* for clean cute guys.

he called my work sunday night wondering how i was, but i had just left, so i didn't get to talk to him. poop. hopefully he'll be at work tomorrow, cause i really wanna see him. i've got a big crush on him, and i've like him for over a month or so now. *sigh*

okay, im gonna go before i *sigh* everyone to sleep. lol
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/61303.html

being single sucks. but right now, it's only for the fact that i have no prom date, once again. ugh. and the guy i like is like 22, and even if he knew i liked him, wouldn't go, because he is 22. i need some single guy friends, everyone is happily in a relationship. how annoying. 

and my prom table is down to me (+date), becky (+date), and sheila and her date josh. and we need at least 5 couples for a table. i don't even know if i want to go anymore. the only reason i'd go now is to show off my dress, otherwise it's going to suck butt. 


well, off to try to do some english, since my project and presentation are due on wednesday. all i have to do is finish writing my stuff up, and practice being john dickens. funfun
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/61084.html

boy, i feel special. we had bowling awards this morning, and i got 2 plaques, and a trophy. the plaques are for: Most Improved Bowler(girls), and 2nd High Set/HNDCP, and the trophy is for our team coming in 9th place. lol. i go from having no trophies or plaques to having too many. hopefully ill have the time, and funds to bowl again next year. it's fun

ugh, i hadn't realized how much of a crush i have on best buy mike until last night. it was when i thought the girl in line behind him was with him, and my heart dropped to my stomach. ugh, but i was just being paranoid, he wasn't talking to her, but to some guy in line in front of him. 

guys suck, but why can't i just realize this and become a nun? ugh
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/60889.html

*yawn* boy oh boy am i ever tired. i got called into work last night, and the only reason i went in was because sophie was all alone. probably wouldn't have gone for anyone else.

im gonna miss good ol' sophie, today's her last day. im staying for another week 1/2, or two weeks, cause best buy has to hire a few more people so they train us all together. and im not sure yet, but i might just work like 1 day a week at hollywood, just for the free movies and stuff. plus, ill need a second job this summer, but who knows. 


oh, went into best buy yesterday, to turn in my drug test paper, and the guy im crushing on right now, mike, came up and we talked for a bit. *sigh* definately like him. 

:P im just hoping i didn't have one of my dopey grins on my face i get sometimes around guys i like. lol
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/60432.html

*YAY* i got the job!! definately glad i got the job at best buy, im sooooo happy. and the weird thing is that everyone said that the manager, frank, was gonna bite my head off, but we got along really well. i thought he was a very nice man, funny. lol. 

and yeah, i deeffinately have a pretty big crush on mike, the guy that works at best buy, and helped me get the job there. ugh. why can't i just live without guys for 4 months?? nooo, i have to get a crush on mike. at least everyone likes him, and he's nice, and tall. lol. and he does come into hollywood alot more now, and even called there a couple times for me. 

maybe i stand a chance?? ugh. i don't know if i even want to know the answer, good or bad. 


god, i need to learn to live without a guy always around. 

lol.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/60280.html

oh, forgot to say, me and my mom were talking when we went out to eat after the docs. and she asked me what i wanted for a graduation present. she said she had wanted to buy me and ring, and my dad wants to buy me a laptop computer. so i said, id rather have the laptop, cause it's definately more useful that a ring. 

plus, i don't really wear that much jewelry. it'd be cool if i got a laptop, cause then i could just take it to college with me, instead of writing on paper, i could just type. nifty neato. lol
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/60088.html

yup, the doctor confirmed that i definately have strep throat. funfun. i had felt bad since friday, and went to the doctors today cause i felt reeallly bad. so he gave me some medicine, and i should be good to go tomorrow. 

ugh, i hate missing school, there's always a toonnnnn of makeup work to do. oh well
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/59665.html

"you and me and a bottle of wine, gonna hold you tonight, mmyeahh" lol

love this song.


so i went up to my interview at Best Buy after school today (about 11:30), and the guy(s) interviewing me were very nice. the main interviewer went through this magazine book thing and asked me a bunch of questions, and wrote them down. then i had to "role play" pretending that i was a salesperson selling stereo's and the other interviewer was the customer. 

i guess i did pretty good, cause they're gonna call today or tomorrow and set up the third (and last) interview with the general manager of the store. but apparently frank (mngr) is pretty rough on interviewees. great. and i was nervous enough today. 


hopefully ill get the job though, cause it'd be good $, and experience in something other than a video store. but i told them i have to have at least 20 hrs a week, or i can't go there. so again, they'll talk to the mngr. 


if not, charles (area mngr at hollywood) is MAJOR buttkissing me into staying. there was even talk about a raise. lol. 

k. gonna go do hwk now. blah. :O)
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/59485.html

yuck, reports suck butt. really. i have yet another report to write, and type up. this time it's a technology report on the plan me and naashona's plan we made. well, at least after this report is done, ill only have my english project to worry about. and that's the hardest of them all. 


ill finish up my english project this weekend i guess. but i don't present unti may 1, but i gotta rock the presentation, so i can get an A in the class. that would just be cool, considering it is my hardest class.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/59271.html

now i might be staying at hollywood, cause im supposed to call the area manager today. sophie told me yesterday that he apparently wants me and sophie to stay, and might even be offering me a raise to stay. now that'd be nice. 

i'd still rather work at best buy, but i've heard from people that you don't get many hours.  grr, i need money, and hours. 


so maybe ill stay at hollywood after all. who knows. besides, it's not that bad of a job, i just get paid jack-shit. yeah.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/59095.html

finally finished it about 1/2 hour ago. it wasn't that bad actually, all i had to do was take my compiled notes on roman military and stuff, and put it into a readable form. easy enough

oh, and i even wrote up a nifty neato game to do if there's time left during my presentation. 




i loovvveee springtime. spring and fall are my favorite times of year. *sigh* spring is the good smelling season, especially in my yard, all of our bushes, and the weeping cherry tree flower, and smell sooooooooo good. 


ugh, i hope best buy calls soon, cause they said they would call sometime before 10:30 tonight, and if they didn't to call them. but that would just be weird, me calling to ask about a call i didn't get? well, hopefully they'll call first.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/58656.html

ugh, i really don't feel like writing my latin paper. i have everything all together, now it's just time to actually do the work. blah. at least i've already finished what im presenting tomorrow and stuff. i even made a nifty game to do if there's time for it. 

well, im gonna go start my paper now, i guess. at least i can half-ass it, cause magistra is a big softie, plus she's not an english teacher, and just got out of college. all that = laura not trying. lol


maybe ill try some, just so it seems like i tried. lol.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/58199.html

ugh, i really don't feel like writing my latin paper. i have everything all together, now it's just time to actually do the work. blah. at least i've already finished what im presenting tomorrow and stuff. i even made a nifty game to do if there's time for it. 

well, im gonna go start my paper now, i guess. at least i can half-ass it, cause magistra is a big softie, plus she's not an english teacher, and just got out of college. all that = laura not trying. lol


maybe ill try some, just so it seems like i tried. lol.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/58503.html

ugh, three pages double spaced, and typed. i have all the research, and i know what i want to say, but as for writing it all out, ugh. 


went to church this morning, with sheila, it was cool. i had to go, cause me and sheila made this deal, where if she was on time to bowling, and brought me coffee, i had to come to church. so she kept her part, and i kept mine. lol


well, back to my latin project, i guess. ugh. 


lol. im such a lazy person sometimes
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/57872.html

today was the last bowling day. :O( ill miss everyone, like the peeps on my team. and i doubt ill be able to join again next year, cause i don't know if ill be able to afford it, or if my class schedule will allow me to. hopefully ill be able too. bowling is fuunn

i also might be joining a bowling league this summer with my friend jarret. 


"im a bitch, im a lover, im a child, im a mother, im a sinner, im a saint, i do not feel ashamed...im nothing in between, you know you wouldn't want me any other way..." 
      i love this song!! and next time i have money, im soo buying this cd. 


you know, i should reeaallly start on my latin project, considering it is due on tue, all three pages typed on the roman military, and i have to make a presentation too. hmm, what can i say, sheila's rubbing off on me. procrastination here i come!!! 


lol. okay, okay, ill go start on it. :P
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/57654.html

thank god for fridays. im tired as crap, even though i fell asleep in like half of my classes today. lol. 

well, i quit my job last night. me, sophie, and jarrett all wrote up our resignations, and sophie faxed them to the district manager, and left copies for the store manager for this morning. im sure mandy will all hate us, but oh well.


oh, and the guy that was helping me yesterday at best buy, who knew me from hollywood, came in last night. he said he'd talk to the manager about hiring me, and that i should definately get the job. *yay* for nice cute guys! lol. 

the cute guy also knows jarrett from college, and he's gonna try and hook jarrett up with a job too. 



im gonna miss my hollywood family. *sniffle* no more working with all my friends and stuff. but we're gonna keep in contact. plus, we do have 2 weeks left too. those'll be fun. :O)
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/57573.html

well, turns out my cool manager, lisa, got fired over some stupid crap. the new manager, i think her name is mandy, is scary. she's nice enough, but you screw up once, and your ass be toast. she told sophie that she's not afraid to fire an entire store if she sees fit. 

ahhhh, and she expects us to do like superhuman work, with the big ol' store we got. and even though i was planning on quitting this summer, i decided to as soon as possible. so i went up to the best buy on ritchie after school today, and applied. 

apparently i did good on this phone test thing i had to take, and the manager of the department i'd be working in(if i get the job) is supposed to call me this coming monday to schedule an interview. coool beans. 


and daammnnn, alot of the guys that work there are hot as a mo.fo. lol. especially this one blonde guy who was helping me with the phone interview, and this other guy that apparently knows me from hollywood. 





*yay* for being single again!! hopefully ill get this job, that'd be cooool, cause they get paid alot more than i do, plus, cute guys everywhere. mmwwwaaahhaaahhaaahhhaa. lol. 


don't mind me
im a dork
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/57212.html

well, im becoming a nun. simple as that. 

yeah, since i was expecting to get dumped, again, i drove home, got looking hot, and went up to adam's work. so i got dumped, but at least his last image of me will be me looking my best, just so he never forgets how damn hot i was when he broke up with me. lol. 

im kinda depressed, but really, i think this was a good experience for me. now i know to never date an ex-b/f who screws ya over. i musta lost my mind for the past couple of weeks. really. i was definately dumb to still be loving him. and though it may take a while to get over him, yet again, but i know i can do it this time. he doesn't deserve me. 

well, im feeling better than i was, cause heather's mom is really cool, and helped cheer me up alot. i was all crying and s*** when i went over looking for heather, and even though she wasn't home, her mom invited me in, and cheered me up alot.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/57020.html

ugh, gotta hate bob. and guys. 




don't even ask.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/56637.html

tired. that about sums it up. lol. worked today, i kept having periods where i was about to fall asleep, then id be hyper as hell. *shrug* who ever said life makes sense. 


work last night was busy as anything, it was just me and rebecca most of the night, and we had lines halfway through the store until like 9. but at least adam brought me some dinner, and then came and visited. i was with him for about 45 min. after i got out of work too. i love talking to adam, we have so much in common and it's just fun. plus kissing, cause damn, the boy can kiss. lol

ill stop now. LOL. im weird. yeah.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/56563.html

i visited adam again at work, i have for the past three days. just cause everytime i talk to him, he's like "come visit me". lol. but it's all good, cause his boss likes me. 


then we went out tonight, to dinner. it was a pretty good dinner. after that we went to his house and watched that mtv show, fear factor, or something like that. i almost fell asleep a couple times, just cause im so tired. 


in fact, i think ill go to bed now. 'night. lol. 0:o)



i really hope we last, cause im really happy being back together with him. and he tells me all the time how happy he is we're back together, and that how it'll work out this time. :O) what can i say, i love the boy. still. 





k, im really going now, i got bowling tomorrow. lol
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/56163.html

i've got projects i could work on, but honestly, i just don't feel like it. i already have most of the material i need, not it's just got to be written up, and all that good crap. ugh. and i have to give presentations for both projects. 


please, God, help me with my english project! i hate standing in front of peeps and giving speeches, or even just talking. *oh dear*



lol, i sound like a little old lady with my "oh dear" crap. lol
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/55933.html

school sucks butt. i can't wait to get out of it. lol. and i can't wait for prom!!!! i want to wear my beeeuuutttiiiffuuulll prom dress, i love it!!!


god im such a dork. lol. 



even though sheila says she won't sit with me if i bring adam, im actually seriously thinking about it. cause he does want to go, and i figure if we're still together (hopefully) ill probably bring him. *shrug* i guess ill bring the subject up sometime.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/55784.html

now that i had all that sleep, and a nap earlier in my sunroom, im wiiiiddddeee awake. lol


now im kinda wishing i had homework to do, cause im certainly awake enough to do it. sheesh. or if adam were home, talk on the phone with him, cause we usually talk really late. *sigh* im such a butt. im just praying he won't break my heart, and that it'll work this time. *crosses fingers*
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/55487.html

chores chores chores and more chores. good thing my plans for the day fell through, i wouldn't have time to go anywhere with my chores. 




well, back to school tomorrow, and boy oh boy will i have a ton of makeup work. i was absent a day and 1/2 last week, ugh. i can't miss anymore school, cause i have to save my days up for my mouth surgery thing. *shudder*


just realized something, when i have my surgery, i can't kiss until my mouth heals. crap. and kissing is such fun, especially with adam. darn it.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/55182.html

*yawn* why am i so tired? i slept until like 11. lol. 


my dad is such a dork, he wakes me up at like 7:30 knocking on my door, telling me that adam is on the phone for me. i open the door, and he hands me the cordless phone. so im trying to say hello, but nobody's answering, and my dad shouts "april fool's!!". dork. lol


since i got 40$ for easter yesterday, i think im gonna go out and figure out how to spend it. *yay* for having some money. 



ugh, now i have too many guys that want to go to prom with me. my friend dave wants to go, cause he didn't get to go to his, and he's moving to florida soon, but adam wants to take me also.  but sheila told me if i took adam, she wouldn't sit at the same table as us, and she's one of my best friends. ugh, why does everything have to be so dang complicated?? hmm, maybe ill just let the boys decide between them. now that's a thought. then again, i don't know.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/54893.html

work today was too busy for a sunday. but at least "my man" (lol) came and visited me before him and his dad went to ocean city for the next 2 days. they'll be up in O.C. until tuesday afternoon/night. then he's supposed to come visit me at work again. *yay* 

i love getting visits at work from people. it just makes me feel so special when my friends come see me at work. lol. the only people who really visit me are jerjer, sheila, becky, and adam. 

adam promised he'd come visit me at work alot, and call me too, cause i love getting calls at work. everyone else does all the time, and i never did except for when i used to date adam, and now, when im dating him again. 



yes, i realize im a big dork, lol.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/54668.html

i did okay at bowling today, except for the last game, i did really sucky. *shrug* only two more weeks of bowling left anyways. 


well, gotta go haul some more stuff in my truck for my 'rents. this time im taking some furniture my mom bought over to the cabin. funfun. after i get back, im supposed to go to the mall with adam.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/54391.html

i think i should go to bed soon, even though im not really tired. i do have to get up rather early tomorrow, for bowling. funfun. 

'night people, unless i decide to watch "Bandits". hmm...sleep or bandits? lol
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/54144.html

ugh, it is sooo boring on friday nights sometimes. i coulda done something with sheila, but i was too lazy, and poor, to go to the movies again. i think the highest point of my evening was talking to adam on his cell while he drove up to a party in baltimore. he has the coolest hookups at his job, i.e. tonight, he gets to go hang out at some Phat Farm party, with models and famous peeps, but technically it's for his business. lol. the bum. 

too bad i wasn't home when he had called at like 3, cause then he woulda done something with me instead, but he couldn't get ahold of me. darn that pile of wood. lol. hopefully ill get to see him after he gets off of work tomorrow.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/53953.html
about to go pick up a truckload of firewood from my cabin, funfun. hopefully it won't be super dirty, cause i just now finished waking up and getting cleaned up. lol.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/53721.html

okay, i decided im awake enough to tell what happened tonight. well, after blake picking me up at like 3:15, we went over heather's, and hung out there, and the mall.

then, we all went to subway, then up to adam's work to see if he was still there. but then adam called and we went up to g.b. to pick him up at his dad's house. so we went up to muvico, and watched blade 2, it was okay, it had just a little too much blood for my tastes though, yeah, the whole swimming in pools of blood was *shudder* ugh. anywho, me and adam were joking around the whole time, and just play punching and tickling each other. it was fun.

same thing on the way back, we were all mad tickling each other. kinda cool. but then we get to adam's house, and yeah, blake definately goes "hey, adam, you like laura right?", and adam goes "yeah". double ugh. then blake says, "so you wanna go back out with her, right?", and again, adam says "yeah". triple ugh. so im like blushing bigtime, and then blake turns to me, and starts asking me if i want to date adam again, and then adam "formally" asks me back out, and im just going "i don't know". 

ugh

well, to make a long story short(er) lol, i ended up deliberating it for a bit, then, what the hell i thought, i mean, you only live once, so i leaned over and kissed him. 

*sigh* why do i have to fall for the guy? ugh. well, at least he wasn't actually serious about the whole blood drinking thing. him and blake just like to freak people out. 






i hope i haven't made a mistake. cause i swear, if i get my heart broken again by this boy, im definately becoming an nun. no doubt about it. a nun. lol.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/53373.html
well, ill write the whole story out tomorrow, im too tired to tonight. *sigh* ugh, im a big butthead, a butthead that can't seem to get over the guy.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/53242.html

well, got there and back okay. pretty uneventful. 

now im off to the mall with blake and heather, they're gonna come pick me up in about 15 minutes. he's gonna buy heather a easter present. lol. then, i guess after that, we're going to pick up adam, and go up to the movies. 

i love the monkeys, what a great band. lol.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/52911.html

hopefully ill be able to find my brother's friend's house fine, considering he lives all the way up in west river md, wherever that is. lol. im printing out directions on mapquest, so please God, don't let me get lost. lol


*yay* i get to go see blade 2 tonight. nifty.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/52481.html

my eyes are feeling somewhat better, but now the skin around the eyes are inflamed and sore. so i came home early from work, sophie said to leave cause my eyes were scaring people. lol (they're all blood red and puffy) ouch. at least the steroid crap the doctor gave me is helping some, i think. 


*yay* im probably going to go see Blade 2 with blake, adam, heather, chris, and annie tomorrow. hopefully my eyes'll be better so i don't look like the walking dead again. lol
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/52227.html

i've been to so many doctors offices in the past week. ugh. and my eyes have just gotten worse, not better. last night i went to nitetime pediatrics again, and they gave me 2 new medicines, and told me to see an opthomologist. 

so i went to the opthomologist this morning, and she took me off one medicine, changed my dosage for the other new medicine, and gave me yet another medicine. the stuff she gave me was some kinda eye steroids, since even that doctor wasn't sure what's going on with my eyes

can i ever have anything NORMAL wrong with me? lol. i guess not. i just get funky eye infections, and have to have surgery on my mouth. lol.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/52102.html

man, i had to come home from work early tonight because my friggin' eye hurts so bad. it's to the point where im even having some trouble seeing out of it. grrrr, im gonna rip the darn thing outta my eye socket, and step on it in about 2 sec. .....



hopefully dad'll come home soon so he can take me to the doctors.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/51962.html

"then i saw her face, now im a believer, not a trace of doubt in mind, ohhh im in love, im a believer i couldn't leave her if i tried"

LOL, sorry i loovvee this song. they play in Shrek. cool movie


so, i visited adam at his work yesterday, cause when we were on the phone, he wanted me too, and it was fun. the bum has his own office, and keys and crap. so we hung out there till he got off, and he came to the tattoo parlor with me. 

guys are confusing, cause blake told me again today that he had talked to adam last night, and apparently he definately wants to get back together with me. 




can't things ever just be simple??? nooo, never. lol
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/51661.html

it's ridiculous, even though i slept in until like 9 this morning, im still dead tired. *shrugs* huh. guess my body is still trying to catch up from not getting like any sleep in the past couple of days. hmm...

GUESS WHAT??!!! im gonna get a tattoo. ill have to wait for my 18th b-day, but i already know pretty much what im going to get i think. i want a celtic cross (black and white) on my upper left arm. that's going to be cool as s***. *yay* can't wait. i even went up to the place im gonna get it done at, it's call Shepke's (or something) across from Lighting Jack's Bar in pasadena. i went up there yesterday with adam. blake told me to go to that one, cause that's where he's getting his tribal tree, and sleeve tattoo done.

if i can figure out how, ill stick a picture of it in here.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/51385.html

can't have a social life for awhile, i have two major projects to do. got a latin III one which is a report on Roman Army Tactics/Battles plus presentation on it, and a HUGE major brit. project on charles dickens. i gotta read two books by him, write book reports, write summaries on articles about him, write a kinda bibiliography thing on him, and make some sorta educational and entertaining presentation about some aspect of his life/books, or whatnot. ugh, school sucks butt


but at least there's only 42 days left of school!! yay
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/50953.html
going to bed now, im dead tired. *yay* only 3 days of school this week.
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/50833.html

ugh, pre-teen boys are some of the most annoying species in the entire world. for example, at like 10 o'clock at work, i was helping a customer, and all of a sudden some kid opens the movie drop and sets a firecracker(s) off. yeah, almost scared the piss outta me. lol. so i had to wait for the police to come, and we even rounded up a bunch of the kids behind the stores, but they said they didn't do it, so no one got in trouble. 

it was kinda funny though, cause we had like 4 cops show up at once. they only show up like that if they're really bored and they hear it over the radio they got. lol. cops are funny. and fat. LOL
http://spblonde.livejournal.com/50490.html

i did really sucky in bowling today, oh well. maybe because i was just reeeaally tired. im going to bed when i get home from work tonight, hopefully. definately needing the sleep.

well, went to see Resident Evil last night, it was a good movie. there were just a couple super bloody parts, and people spouting blood because a zombie just bit them. lol. my friend nashana and her b/f were there, so me and adam sat with them. other than the whole weird thing with him thinking he's immortal, he's still the same pretty much. just now he wears all black, but daaammmmnnn does he look good in it. and his hair was all different, but it still looked good. lol. why do i have to have such a hot ex? ugh.
